mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(article_id,admin_id, comm_email, comm_nickname, comm_content, comm_time) values (#{article_id},#{admin_id},#{comm_email},#{comm_nickname},#{comm_content},#{comm_time})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE comm_email=#{comm_email}

SELECT c.admin_id,comm_content,comm_nickname,comm_time,head_img,c.article_id,comm_id FROM Article INNER JOIN Admin A on Article.admin_id = A.admin_id INNER JOIN comment c on Article.article_id = c.article_id WHERE notify = false AND A.admin_id = #{admin_id} ORDER BY comm_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET notify=true WHERE comm_id = #{comm_id}
